function.description: Enter your height in meters.
Enter your weight in kilograms.
Click to calculate your BMI.
Your BMI will be displayed here.
BMI categories will be shown for interpretation.
Choose the currencies you want to convert between.
Input the amount you want to convert.
The page will display the current exchange rate between the selected currencies.
Click this button to perform the conversion and display the result.
This section displays a list of all the previous conversions made using the app.
Choose a date range to view conversions from a specific period.
Select from different sources for live currency data.
Choose the currencies you want displayed by default on the home page.
Creates a strong and secure password based on specified criteria.
Specify your own rules for password generation.
Evaluate the security of your generated password.
Store your password securely and share it with others easily.
Specify the desired length of your password.
Choose from a wide range of characters to create your password.
Set specific rules for uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
View the generated password before finalizing it.
Fine-tune your password creation rules.
Store your custom settings for future use.
Check if two passwords are equal or different.
Easily copy your generated password to your clipboard.
Share your password securely through a unique link.
Access your past password generations for reference.
Enter text, choose a code size and generation settings.
Upload an existing image to generate a QR code from its pixels.
Create a personalized design template for your QR code.
Review your generated QR code and download it in various formats.
Enter the desired text to be encoded in the QR code.
Select the desired size of the generated QR code in pixels.
Choose the desired level of error correction for the QR code.
Select the image file from your device to generate a QR code from its pixels.
The system will automatically preprocess your image for QR code generation.
Choose the primary and secondary colors for your QR code design.
Upload your logo or image to be centered in the QR code.
Select from various patterns or design your own background for your QR code.
A live preview of your generated QR code will be displayed.
Select the desired download format (PNG, SVG, EPS) and quality for your QR code.
Convert your markdown files to clean, semantic HTML.
Observe changes in your markdown as they happen in the converted HTML.
Fine-tune the conversion process with various settings.
Supports code snippets with syntax highlighting for improved readability.
Preserves your markdown tables in their original format.
Imports images from your markdown files into the generated HTML.
The engine identifies markdown syntax and element structures.
Specific rules are applied to convert markdown elements into HTML tags.
The final HTML code is generated and displayed in the browser.
Create a new task with title and description.
List all current tasks, sorted by due date.
Search for tasks by title or description.
Update the title, description or due date of a task.
Indicate that a task has been completed.
Remove a task from the list.
Add, edit or delete users with access to the application.
Choose from different color schemes and layouts.
Displays a breakdown of allocated funds for different categories.
Input the amount and category of an item to reduce the available balance.
Visualize the changing balance over time with a chart.
Search and categorize past expenses based on date or category.
Download detailed expense reports for further analysis.
Identify spending patterns and optimize future budgets.
Establish boundaries for different categories to avoid overspending.
Connect the application with financial accounts for automatic expense tracking.
Design personalized reports with specific filters and data points.
Displays a grid with days of the month
Allows users to choose the desired month from a dropdown menu
Lets users click on specific days to mark them as important or unavailable
Provides different color options to categorize markings
Permits users to add brief notes to each marked day
Shows only marked days or a combination of marked and unmarked days
Allows users to upload a calendar file in a supported format
Permits users to download their marked calendar as a file
The chatbot understands context, intent, and sentiment from user conversations.
Provides relevant and personalized responses based on user history, environment, and intent.
Continuous learning and adaptation based on user feedback and conversations.
Communicates seamlessly in various languages to reach a wider audience.
Regularly evolving with new features and capabilities based on user demand.
Input meals and snacks to automatically calculate calorie intake.
Create personalized calorie targets based on health and fitness aspirations.
Track calories consumed and burned over time and assess progress towards goals.
Categorize foods based on calorie density and nutritional value.
Visualize calorie distribution across breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks.
Track calorie intake over days and weeks to identify patterns and progress.
Manage personal information, goals, and preferences.
Control access to and security of calorie tracking data.
Receive reminders and alerts to stay accountable for calorie intake.
The welcome message should be displayed on the page.
The navigation button should be visible and navigate to the password generator page.
The page should provide information about the website's purpose and functionality.
Allows employees to submit claim forms for various expenses.
Displays a list of submitted claims for review.
Administrators can approve valid claims and update their status.
Administrators can reject claims and provide feedback to employees.
Administrators can search for specific claims based on various criteria.
Administrators can monitor and analyze the budget balance for different expense categories.
Administrators can set and adjust budgets for different expense categories.
Create a new client record with name, birthday, age, sex, company and phone number.
Modify existing client information including name, birthday, age, sex, company and phone number.
Display a list of all clients with relevant details.
Find clients by specific criteria like name, birthday, company or phone number.
Create a new product with name, category and recommended price.
Update existing product information including name, category and recommended price.
List all products with details.
Find products by name or category.
Record a purchase with datetime, product, customer, quantity and amount.
Modify existing purchase records.
List all purchase transactions with details.
Find purchases by date, product or customer.
Visualize total sales by date, product or customer.
Identify most purchased products.
Analyze purchasing behavior of individual customers.
Generate reports and recommendations based on sales data.
The page displays 'Hello World!' text in a prominent location.
Clicking this button will redirect you to the 'helloworld' page.
Launch 'Spring Semester Subjects.xlsx' from the specified location.
Extract data from the first four columns of 'Spring Semester Subjects.xlsx' into a two-dimensional table.
Translate the 'Time' column values into numerical representations (1-4).
Write the transformed data into a new Excel file with a custom structure.
Open the 'Gamedata.xlsx' dataset.
Create a one-period lag of the 'result' column.
Extract all remaining columns as independence variables.
Fit a logistic model using the extracted independence variables and the lagged 'result' column.
Output the model summary to 'Logistic.xlsx'.
Find a specific item or category.
Explore different product or service categories.
Learn more about our company and values.
Detailed information about the product/service.
Purchase the item/service.
See what others have said about this product/service.
See the items you've added to your cart.
Change the amount of items in your cart.
Complete your purchase.
Reads the 'Deathlist.csv' dataset and stores it in a variable.
Extracts the week of death from the 'Date of death' field.
Counts the number of deaths for each week.
Creates a histogram depicting weekly deaths.
Prints the histogram to the console.
Find existing projects by title or keyword.
Start a new project from scratch.
Access templates, tutorials, and other helpful materials.
Search and categorize projects by status, team, or deadline.
See key information about each project, including progress and team members.

Create reports on project progress, team performance, and resource utilization.
